Title: Project Adventuring
Credits: Changes: Kin Yin Ho || Created by Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu).

Forest Entrance.Body:
You stand at the entrance to a vast, ancient forest, [PLAYER_NAME]. The trees sway gently, whispering secrets in the wind.

A faint path lies ahead, disappearing into the mist.

Forest Path.Body:
The trail is worn and quiet. Every footstep from [PLAYER_NAME] seems to echo between the towering trunks.

Three paths branch out ahead, each calling to you in a different way.

Whispering Grove.Body: The air is lighter here, [PLAYER_NAME]. Leaves dance around you like playful spirits. Whispers brush against your ear — voices too soft to understand.

Glowing Swamp.Body: Bioluminescent plants light the murky waters, casting a glow around [PLAYER_NAME]. Without help, it would be easy to lose your way here...

Runestone Circle.Body: Massive stones rise from the earth, etched with glowing ancient runes. One of them hums softly as [PLAYER_NAME] approaches, almost like... an invitation.

Abandoned Shrine.Body: Abandoned Shrine, a place of forgotten magic.

Moonstone Gate.Body: Moonstone Gate stands tall, requiring special keys to pass the village.

Heart Tree Grove.Body: The largest tree has ever seen towers before you. Its bark shimmers like gold, its branches hum with ancient power. The air feels heavy with expectation.

Village.Body:
[PLAYER_NAME] steps into the village beyond the Heart Tree. Warm light glows from every window. Children laugh. Elders sing.

Yet something stirs within you...

WyrmBurrow.Body: A yawning hole exhales a chill wind. Something ancient once lived here, [PLAYER_NAME] — and maybe still does.
